owl:Ontology.terms:creator: Dario Bonino (dario.bonino@gmail.com)
owl:Ontology.terms:title: DogOnt: Ontology Modeling for Intelligent Domotic Environments
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment:
The version 4.0.1 solves an import problem with the UCUM ontology (http://purl.oclc.org/NET/muo/ucum/), which is not reachable on the Web since August 2017 (at least). This results in a non-working dogont ontology.
To solve this issue, we temporarly self-hosted (with an IRI change) the UCUM ontology, which is now correclty imported in dogont. Please, notice that this is a *temporary* solution. We are planning to use the QUDT 2.0 ontologies, once they will be fully released.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates which object are contained in a building environment, e.g. the kitchen contains Lamp1,Lamp2...
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between a controller and the controlled object
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: controlledObject

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between a mobile uncontrollable object and its actuator
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasActuator

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between an object and its controller,e.g.switch,button,knob
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasControl

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a given domotic component with the network level gateway used to control it
Association between an object and its sensor
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasSensor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Provide the actual state to controllable things
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasState

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between a room and its walls
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasWall

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between a wall and its opening like door,window
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasWallOpening

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates in which building environment is contained an object, e.g. the lamp5 isIn Kitchen
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isIn

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between a wallopening(door or window) and the wall opening where it is
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isInWall

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association between a sensor and its sensed object
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isSensorOf

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The IP address of the gateway
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: IPAddress

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The time before the connection expires
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: connectionTimeOut

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of connection trials before failure
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: connectionTrials

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The ILON id of a given datapoint associated to the command or notification of a given echelon-managed device
The address (URL) of the web service endpoint at which the ILON100 server having this property offers data reading and writing services
The flashing period duration in seconds
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: flashingTime

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The address of the group of the component
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: groupAddress

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The individual address of the component
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: individualAddress

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The multicast address of the gateway
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: multicastIP

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A property holding the svg footprint for the given building environment object
The time in seconds during which the object is turned on
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: timeToOff

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that provides security about access
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AccessControlSystem

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that puts something into automatic action
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Actuator

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A system that keeps air cool and dry
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AirConditioningSystem

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A clock that wakes sleeper at preset time
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AlarmClock

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Electronic device that answers the telephone and records messages
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AnsweringMachine

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that provides security about intrusion
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AntiIntrusionSystem

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Durable goods for home or office use
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Appliances

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: All the architectural elements that compose the environment
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Architectural

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Chair with a support on each side for arms
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Armchair

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A canopy made of canvas to shelter people or things from rain or sun.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Awning

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that allow automatic control about awning
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AwningActuator

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Components manufactured by Bticino
owl:Class.rdfs:label: BTicinoComponent

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A BTIcino Gateway
owl:Class.rdfs:label: BTicinoGateway

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A platform projecting from the wall of a building and surrounded by a balustrade or railing or parapet
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Balcony

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A room containing a bath or shower and usually a washbasin and toilet
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bathroom

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A relatively large open container that you fill with water and use to wash the body
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bathtub

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Piece of furniture that provides a place to sleep.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bed

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A room used primarily for sleeping
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bedroom

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A basin for washing genitals and anal area
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bidet

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sealed vessel where water is warm up
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Boiler

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Small household electrical entertainment appliances
owl:Class.rdfs:label: BrownGoods

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A physical environment in which people lives, e.g. kitchen, bathroom
owl:Class.rdfs:label: BuildingEnvironment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: All things that creates a Building, it is intended as root of all building components
owl:Class.rdfs:label: BuildingThing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A monostable electrical switch operated by pressing a button
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Button

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An electric signaling device, such as a doorbell, that makes a buzzing sound.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Buzzer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The overhead upper surface of a room
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ceiling

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A seat for one person, with a support for the back.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Chair

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Confine to a small space.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Closet

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A kitchen appliance for brewing coffee automatically
owl:Class.rdfs:label: CoffeeMaker

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Color Dimmable Light device can be switched on and off, and its luminance, hue and saturation levels may be controlled, derives from ZigBee HA specifications
The Color Dimmer Switch device can turn a light on and off, and control the luminance, hue and saturation levels of a multicolor light, derives from ZigBee HA specifications
Appliances for communicate
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Communication

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A machine for performing calculations automatically, work and play
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Computer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities continuous in time or space
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ContinuousFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Notification of continuous values
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ContinuousNotificationFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: States continuous in time or space
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ContinuousState

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that controls the interaction with the electrical system
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Control

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Capability of a controllable building thing that can receive commands
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ControlFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: All building things that can be controlled by domotic system
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Controllable

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A utensil for cooking
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cooker

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A small room (or recess) or cabinet used for storage space
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cupboard

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Electric refrigerator in which food is frozen and stored for long periods of time
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DeepFreezer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A piece of furniture with a writing surface and usually drawers or other compartments
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Desk

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Dimmable Light device is a light that can be switched on and off, and whose luminance level may be controlled, derives from ZigBee HA specifications
Lamp that varies the level of illumination
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DimmerLamp

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Switch for controlling dimmable lights, derives from ZigBee HA specifications
A room used for dining
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DiningRoom

owl:Class.terms:description: Describes the state of the device discovery process, i.e., of the process charged to discover new devices on a Home Area network. It can either be active, if the discovery process is on going, or idle, if not.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities not continuous, with fixed values
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DiscreteFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Notification of fixed values
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DiscreteNotificationFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: States not continuous, with fixed values
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DiscreteState

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A machine for washing dishes
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dishwasher

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A swinging or sliding barrier that will close the entrance to a room or building.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Door

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that allow automatic opening and closing about door
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DoorActuator

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that controls if a door is closed
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DoorSensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete functionalities with exactly two values
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DoubleValuedFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete notification with exactly two values
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DoubleValuedNotificationFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete states with exactly two values
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DoubleValuedState

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A boxlike container in a piece of furniture; made so as to slide in and out
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Drawer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Appliance thar read dvd
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dvd

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Electrical Cooker
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ElectricalCooker

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Electrical oven
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ElectricalOven

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Utility that provides electricity
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ElectricalSystem

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Emulated component
owl:Class.rdfs:label: EliteComponent

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A software emulator of a network level to be used for simulating devices not available in the real world
owl:Class.rdfs:label: EliteGateway

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A diversion that holds the attention
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Entertainment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device for creating a current of air
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fan

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Models the capability of controlling the speed of a cooling/heating fan. Derives from ZigBee HA
Appliance that send text and document
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fax

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A barrier that serves to enclose an area
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fence

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An opening in a Fence
owl:Class.rdfs:label: FenceOpening

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that detects the presence of fire
owl:Class.rdfs:label: FireSystem

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Lamp that emits light in sudden short or intermittent bursts
owl:Class.rdfs:label: FlashingLamp

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that detects the presence of flood
owl:Class.rdfs:label: FloodSensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that detects the presence of flood
owl:Class.rdfs:label: FloodSystem

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The inside lower horizontal surface of a room
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Floor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A refrigerator in which the coolant is pumped around by an electric motor
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fridge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Capability of a controllable building thing
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Functionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Furnishings that make a room or other area ready for occupancy
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Furniture

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The garage of the buinding
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Garage

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The garden of the building
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Garden

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Gas Cooker
owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasCooker

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Heater that combusts gas
owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasHeater

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that detects the presence of gas
owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasSensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: System that detects the presence of gas
owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasSystem

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Heater that combusts gasoil
owl:Class.rdfs:label: GasoilHeater

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A door-like movable barrier in a fence
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Gate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that allow automatic opening and closing about gate
owl:Class.rdfs:label: GateActuator

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: the command for getting the occupancy state of a given room/environment
Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications
Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications
Heating Ventilating and Air Conditioning system
owl:Class.rdfs:label: HVACSystem

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device that heats water or supplies warmth
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Heater

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Heating and Cooling Unit device can heat or cool a space in a house. It is not mandatory to provide both functionalities. It may be an indoor air handler. Derives from ZigBee HA specifications
Utility to warm a building
owl:Class.rdfs:label: HeatingSystem

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Equipment for the reproduction of sound with high fidelity
owl:Class.rdfs:label: HiFi

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The horizontal architectural component of a building
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Horizontal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A portable electric appliance for heating or cooking or keeping food warm
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Hotplate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The capability of measuring the humidity of a room
The notification for requesting humidity measurment...
Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications
Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications
Sensor that detects the presence of a living entity in the sensor's range
owl:Class.rdfs:label: InfraredSensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A telephonic intercommunication system linking different rooms in a building
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Interphone

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A large whirlpool bathtub with underwater jets that massage the body
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Jacuzzi

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A room equipped for preparing meals
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Kitchen

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A round handle used to adjust continuous amplitude, e.g. volume
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Knob

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Components manufactured by Konnex
owl:Class.rdfs:label: KonnexComponent

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Konnex Gateway
owl:Class.rdfs:label: KonnexGateway

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An artificial source of visible illumination
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Lamp

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Level control functionality, used for allowing devices to be controlled in a continuous manner, derives from ZigBee Home Automation specifications
Level control switch, derives from the ZigBee Home Automation specification
Output device whose output level can be controlled continuously, by means of a level-control command (notification), derives from ZigBee HA specifications
Models the state of the object that illuminates
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LightIntensityState

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities for the regulation of ligth
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LightRegulationFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The capability of sensing the luminance of the environment in which a device is located accepts only the get command, with 1 parameter, i.e. the luminance value. Derives from ZigBee specifications
The Light Sensor device reports the illuminance of an area
System that provides artificial light
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Lighting

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A room where people can sit and talk and relax
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LivingRoom

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A large entrance
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Lobby

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Microwave oven
owl:Class.rdfs:label: MicrowaveOven

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Flow Sensor device measures and periodically reports the flow rate of a liquid (typically water)
The capability of measuring the humidity of a room
The notification for requesting humidity measurment...
The Pressure Sensor device measures and periodically reports the pressure of a liquid (typically water)
The capability of measuring temperatures
Notifies the measurment of a temperature, through a proper temperature sensor
Sensor that detects the temperature of the atmosphere
owl:Class.rdfs:label: MultipleTemperatureSensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Models the temperature value
owl:Class.rdfs:label: MultipleTemperatureState

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Measures volumes of substances flowing through duct or pipes (originally inserted for modeling the Kamstrup Multical 602)
The manufacturers of the domotic component
owl:Class.rdfs:label: NetworkComponent

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications
Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications
A small table or stand placed at a bedside.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Nightstand

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Capability of a controllable building thing that notifies information,e.g.door sensor notifies "open"-"close"
owl:Class.rdfs:label: NotificationFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality for getting the occupancy state of a given room
The Occupancy Sensor device reports the occupancy state of an area. Derives from ZigBee HA specifications
Functionality to switch on and off an object with a given switching period
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffFlashingFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality: turn on - turn off
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Simple lamp that can be just turn on or turn off
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffLiight

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: OnOffSwitch for Lights only, derives from ZigBee HA specifications
Notification: on - off
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffNotificationFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Models a binary output which can be only in on or off state (OnOffState), compatible with the ZigBee HA specifications
State: on - off
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OnOffState

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Generic OnOff switch, derives from the ZigBee Home Automation specification
Functionality: open - close
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OpenCloseFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Notification: open - close
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OpenCloseNotification

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: State: open - close
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OpenCloseState

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Kitchen appliance used for baking or roasting
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Oven

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A vertical structure that divides or separates
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Partition

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Heater that combusts wood-pellet
owl:Class.rdfs:label: PelletHeater

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Appliance to comunicate with other person
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Phone

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Pressure Sensor device measures and periodically reports the pressure of a liquid (typically water)
Output device that prints
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Printer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Pump device is a pump that may have variable speed. It may have optional built-in sensors and a regulation mechanism. It is typically used for pumping water. Derives from ZigBee HA specifications.
The Pump device controller can control a Pump device

owl:Class.terms:description: Describes the possible states in which the push-link authentication process can be, which are either active, i.e., the manager is registering access credentials on the bridge whose push-button has been pressed by the user, or idle, i.e., doing nothing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Capability of a controllable building thing that must reply to an interrogation about its state
owl:Class.rdfs:label: QueryFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A communication system based on broadcasting electromagnetic waves
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Radio

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A room of the building
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Room

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: All the fixtures of a bathroom
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SanitaryFixtures

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications
Derives from the general cluster functionalities defined in ZigBee HA specifications
The Scene Selector device is capable of setting up and selecting scenes on other devices, including group of devices. It derives from ZigBee HA specifications.
Security system for detecting dangerous situation and intrusion
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SecuritySystem

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class for grouping all electrically powered sensors
Shade object, the name includes an underscore sign only for distinguishing the name from the shade actuator, whose name is directly mapped from ZigBee

The Shade Actuator device provides the ability to open or close window coverings, including setting partially open or partially closed states. This device type includes roller shades, drapes and tilt-only blinds actuators. Derives from ZigBee HA specifications (Shade device)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Shade

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Shade Controller device can control the level of a shade, derives from ZigBee HA specifications

Value for the Shade position state, the shade position can be expressed as position=closedLimitx(255-level)/255, where with level 0 the shade is closed and with level 255 the shade is completely open. Derives from ZigBee HA specifications.
A plumbing fixture that sprays water over you
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Shower

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A hinged cover or screen for a window, usually fitted with louvers.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Shutter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that allow automatic control about shutter
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ShutterActuator

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities for the regulation of shutter
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ShutterRegulationFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Simple lamp that can be just turn on or turn off
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SimpleLamp

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Notification functionality for controlling continuously adjustable device, e.g. dimmers, derives from ZigBee Home Automation specifications
The Flow Sensor device measures and periodically reports the flow rate of a liquid (typically water)
Sensor that detects the temperature of the atmosphere
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TemperatureSensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete functionalities with exactly one value
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SingleValuedFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete notification with exactly one values

A device in which compressed air or steam is driven against a rotating perforated disk to create a loud, often wailing sound as a signal or warning.
An electronic device producing a similar sound as a signal or warning: a police car siren.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Siren

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that detects the presence of smoke
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SmokeSensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An upholstered seat for more than one person
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sofa

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Plays a Sound (default, or selected through a goTotrack, or...)
A functionality describing the ability of a device, tipically an appliance, to start, stop or pause its current cycle.
Models the states of the controllable objects
owl:Class.rdfs:label: State

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Little Room for storage of things in the house
owl:Class.rdfs:label: StorageRoom

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Heating apparatus
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stove

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The total volume either in liters or cubic meters of a substance typically flowing through some ducts (or pipes).

A functionality describing the ability of the device to start/stop a super cooling cycle (typical of fridges, freezers and refrigerators). This functionality is defined in the energy@home zigbee extension and in the EN50523 specification.

Describes the ability of a device to start/stop a super freezing cycle, tipically defined for fridges, refrigerators and freezers. Derives from the energy@home zigbee extension and from the EN50523 standard
Camera of video surveillance
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SurveillanceCamera

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bi-stable control consisting of a mechanical or electrical or electronic device for making or breaking or changing the connections in a circuit
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Switch

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A piece of furniture having a smooth flat top that is usually supported by one or more vertical legs
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Table

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: All technical systems including, e.g., Electrical system, Hydraulic system
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TechnicalSystem

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The capability of measuring temperatures
Notifies the measurment of a temperature, through a proper temperature sensor
Models the temperature value
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TemperatureState

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Outdoor area adjoining a residence
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Terrace

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities for the regulation of temperature
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TemperatureRegulationFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The thermostat request notification, requires a device having the thermostat control functionality to increase, set or decrease the current temperature. Derives from ZigBee HA (slightly modified...)
Functionalities for the regulation of timer
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TimeRegulationFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality to switch on an object for a given period of time
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TimedOnFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete functionalities with exactly three values
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TripleValuedFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Discrete states with exactly three values
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TripleValuedState

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A receiver that displays television images
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tv

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Anything that cannot be interfaces by a domotic, Iot or ICT system
owl:Class.rdfs:label: UnControllable

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality: up - down
owl:Class.rdfs:label: UpDownFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionality: up - down - rest
owl:Class.rdfs:label: UpDownRestFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: State: up - down - rest
owl:Class.rdfs:label: UpDownRestState

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that circulates fresh air and expels stale or foul air.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ventilator

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The vertical architectural component of a building
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Vertical

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Models the volume value
owl:Class.rdfs:label: VolumeLevel

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Functionalities for the regulation of volume
owl:Class.rdfs:label: VolumeRegulationFunctionality

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An architectural partition used to divide or enclose an area or to support another structure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Wall

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An opening in a Wall
owl:Class.rdfs:label: WallOpening

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A tall piece of furniture that provides storage space for clothes
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Wardrobe

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A basin for washing the hands
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Washbasin

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A home appliance for washing clothes and linens automatically
owl:Class.rdfs:label: WashingMachine

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A plumbing fixture for defecation and urination
owl:Class.rdfs:label: WaterCloset

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Ideally would be better as subclass of WaterVolumeMeasurementNotification but it makes code generation more difficult

Major household appliances.
It mus be noticed that the functionality modeling uses existential quantifiers for functionalities that can be optional, this is only for the sake of easier interpretation and should be improved in future releases
owl:Class.rdfs:label: WhiteGoods

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A framework that contains a glass windowpane and is built into a wall or roof to admit light or air
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Window

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A mechanism that allow automatic opening and closing about window
owl:Class.rdfs:label: WindowActuator

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sensor that controls if a window is closed
owl:Class.rdfs:label: WindowSensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Phone with no wire
